roleset.name: talk like the pope
roleset.note: PONTIFICATE-V NOTES: Pontificate, unlike other verbs of saying, is usually intransitive,showing a mode of behavior more than any specific act of speaking. (from pontificate.01-v)
PONTIFICATING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, pontificate-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls lecture-37.11-1. (from pontificating.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Witnesses shout, scream, pontificate: ``...a dream that the planet could be saved from itself and from the sadistic dumb creatures who try to tear down every decent man who raises his voice.''
example.arg: a dream that the planet could be saved from itself and from the sadistic dumb creatures who try to tear down every decent man who raises his voice
